message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I like the product, but $95 seems a bit high for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I can offer it to you for $82.50
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  How about we settle at $75?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $80, which is the lowest I can go. What do you say?
